name: Party Animals (itch) (kalzme)
description:
Party Animals!

A collection of fun single-button party games await you and up to 3 friends! Once you have tested each other's skill over 5 games, it's time to party....
oh, did we mention there is only 1 keyboard? Chaos is sure to ensue as each of you battle it out for those precious stars!

With 6 different games to choose, there is plenty of variety:

  • Pump it Up - Test your luck to see who can get the biggest balloon, but don't pop it!
  • Speedballers - Jump over those pesky cannonballs or get blown to smithereens, yarrr.
  • Topsy-Turvy - Do your best to keep the spinning top in your zone, and away from everyone else!
  • Keyboard Colours - Can you remember ALL the letters on the cards? And then press the correct key when your team's colour is revealed? Good luck!
  • Lil Zoomers - Hop into tiny go-karts and zip around the track, hopefully ahead of everyone else!
  • Fast Flippin' - Quick reflexes will get you the points on each card, but if you go over, you start to lose points. Do your math!
